oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Jay Bland and Thomas Maupin demonstrate their dancing skills
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Reigning national buckdancing champion Jay Bland (far left) and Thomas Maupin (far right) demonstrate their dancing skills at the opening reception for the Tradition: Tennessee Lives and Legacies exhibit at the Nashville Public Library, March 2012.

Maupin is a 2011 Tennessee Folklife Heritage Award recipient. Dean Dixon was contracted by the TAC to handle photographic duties for this project. Robert Cogswell, director of TAC's Folklife Program, provided text for the book and exhibit project.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bland, Jay; Case, Jackie; Rothwell, Daniel; Rothwell, Dan; Maupin, Thomas
